snippet.title: Moons of Madness Public Teaser
snippet.description:
"The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear. And the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown." ~ H.P. Lovecraft.

Moons of Madness throws the player into a unique, first person, psychological horror game, combining Lovecraft influence with hard sci-fi.

Check out the Website and development blog: http://www.moonsofmadness.com
Follow the game on Facebook: http://on.fb.me/1Th3Lyw
